text: Jacme Taupiac (born 12 February 1939) is an Occitan author and linguist. He was one of the leaders of the Institut d'Estudis Occitans. He also modernized the Occitan grammar of Alib√®rt and promoted the linguistic normalization of Val d'Aran. He is also a recognized Esperantist. ==Reference== *Biography on the magazine Calenda Category:Linguists Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Occitanie Category:People from Tarn-et-Garonne
title: Jacme Taupiac
